data.name: Gnome
data.description:
Gnome

Units:
+10% attack rate (organic units only)
+3 HP/s (mechanical units only)
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Traits: Even though fast and evasive, but still very weak organic units, who rely heavily on mechanical bots and advanced technology. Some really awesome and groundbreaking technology...

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+20% building HP regeneration
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Static Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Personel Shield Belts [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Nitrous Boost

Reduces spell damage to Mechanostrider, Laser Gunner, Technomancer and Field Engineer by 25%. Increases their armor by 4.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: ST Mark One [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Refracting Beam

Spider Tank replaces Laser Gunner
Ranged Unit (Mechanical)
+50 HP
Abilities:
Attack Protocol (Self Spell)
(+100% attack rate for 10 sec)
AA Heatseekers (Passive Skill)
(300 damage to 1 Air unit)
Upgrades used:
High Tech Weapons
Mithril Plating
Refracting Beam
Final Protocol

Type: Anti Air

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power
If you like your Heroes, this makes them even better. Some races depend on them more than others, though.

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.name: Pawn Item [A]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Anti-Magic Shield [C]
bonuses.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.
Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:

Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Unleash the Chicken
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: summoning ability
Affects: Technomancer

Lv1: summons Rob-o-Chicken Mk-I for 10 sec
Lv2: summons Rob-o-Chicken Mk-II for 15 sec
Lv3: summons Rob-o-Chicken Mk-III for 20 sec
Lv4: summons Rob-o-Chicken Mk-IV for 25 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Refracting Beam
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 30% for extra damage
Affects: Laser Gunner

Lv1: 25 damage, 1 bounce
Lv2: 30 damage, 2 bounces
Lv3: 35 damage, 3 bounces
Lv4: 40 damage, 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Big ZAP
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage
Affects: Zaper Copter
(slows units for 1 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 8% to do 40 damage in 175 AoE
Lv2: 14% to do 50 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 20% to do 60 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: 26% to do 70 damage in 175 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Nitrous Boost
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and charge
Affects: Mechanostrider and Field Engineer
(bonus move speed lasts 4 sec)

Lv1: +5% attack, +90% move speed
Lv2: +10% attack, +120% move speed
Lv3: +15% attack, +150% move speed
Lv4: +20% attack, +180% move speed

towerUpgrades.name: Final Protocol
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage upon death
Affects: All mechanical non-Air units

Lv1: 30 damage in 100 AoE
Lv2: 45 damage in 120 AoE
Lv3: 60 damage in 140 AoE
Lv4: 75 damage in 160 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Targeting Link
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Field Engineer
(affects mechanical units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +10% damage in 600 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 700 AoE
Lv3: +30% damage in 800 AoE
Lv4: +40% damage in 900 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Overkill
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and splash on kill
Affects: Missile Tank
(affects organic units only)
(splash deals damage in 175 AoE)

Lv1: +6 damage, 60 splash damage
Lv2: +12 damage, 80 splash damage
Lv3: +18 damage, 100 splash damage
Lv4: +24 damage, 120 splash damage

towerUpgrades.name: Drop the Bot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: summoning ability
Affects: Zaper Copter

Lv1: summons Alarm-o-Bot Mk-I for 15 sec
Lv2: summons Alarm-o-Bot Mk-II for 20 sec
Lv3: summons Alarm-o-Bot Mk-III for 25 sec
Lv4: summons Alarm-o-Bot Mk-IV for 30 sec

(has -5/10/15/20% damage aura)

Units:
+10% attack rate (organic units only)

+10% attack rate

Upgrades:

Traits: Even though fast and evasive, but still very weak organic units, who rely heavily on mechanical bots and advanced technology. Some really awesome and groundbreaking technology...

skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

+750 hit points

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:

Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: All Terrain Assault Walker
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Missile Hail (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage
(550-700 area of effect)

Defence Protocol (Self Spell)
+100 armor for 6-12 sec

Electroshock (Damage Spell)
125-275 damage, 20-32% slow
(350-500 area of effect)

Repair Protocol (Self Spell)
restores 400-1000 HP over 10 sec

heroes.name: Spider Tank Mk-III
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Attack Protocol (Self Spell)
120% AS, 60% MS for 10-20 sec

High Impulse Gun (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Shrink Ray (Disable Spell)
50% slow for 6-12 sec
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
30-40% to evade an attack

heroes.name: Enhanced Mobility Suit
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Overload (Support Spell)
15-27% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Defence Protocol (Self Spell)
+100 armor for 6-12 sec

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% damage bonus

Flamethrower Protocol (Self Spell)
ranged attack for 20-30 sec

heroes.name: Destruct-o-Bot
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9s stun
(300-600 area of effect)

Electroshock (Damage Spell)
200-350 damage, 20-32% slow
(450-600 area of effect)

Core Meltdown (Passive Skill)
2000-4000 damage on death
(doesn't affect buildings)
(full/half damage in 250/500 AoE)

Shrink Ray (Disable Spell)
50% slow for 6-12 sec
(affects Heroes only)
